text: Isala is a monotypic genus of South Pacific crab spiders containing the single species, Isala punctata. It was first described by Ludwig Carl Christian Koch in 1876, and is found in Australia. ==See also== * List of Thomisidae species ==References== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Australia Category:Taxa named by Carl Ludwig Koch Category:Spiders described in 1876 Category:Thomisidae
title: Isala punctata
